Sentencas: The mechanically mixed NiO/YSZ powder was usually used as the anode material of atmospheric plasma sprayed (APS) solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Fabrication of finely structured silicon-supported SOFC with anode deposited by multi-phase plasma spraying

Sentencas: Big particles and the non-uniform distribution of the pores were observed in the resultant anode layer.
Titulo: Fabrication of finely structured silicon-supported SOFC with anode deposited by multi-phase plasma spraying

Sentencas: To overcome the limitations, a method of fabricating anode layer by multi-phase plasma spraying (MPS) was proposed in this paper.
Titulo: Fabrication of finely structured silicon-supported SOFC with anode deposited by multi-phase plasma spraying

Sentencas: The NiO and YSZ powders were delivered into plasma jet by a separate injection, where nitrogen carrier was employed to feed micrometer-sized NiO powder and liquid carrier was to feed submicrometer-sized YSZ powder.
Titulo: Fabrication of finely structured silicon-supported SOFC with anode deposited by multi-phase plasma spraying

Sentencas: Suspension plasma spraying (SPS) was applied to fabricate dense electrolyte layer.
Titulo: Fabrication of finely structured silicon-supported SOFC with anode deposited by multi-phase plasma spraying

Sentencas: The microstructure and composition of coatings were characterized by SEM and EDS.
Titulo: Fabrication of finely structured silicon-supported SOFC with anode deposited by multi-phase plasma spraying

Sentencas: The results showed that finely structured anode layer with small particle size (d similar to 2 mu m) was achieved by the MPS method.
Titulo: Fabrication of finely structured silicon-supported SOFC with anode deposited by multi-phase plasma spraying

Sentencas: The MPS anode layer was porous with the porosity of 32.1% while the APS anode layer was 22.6%.
Titulo: Fabrication of finely structured silicon-supported SOFC with anode deposited by multi-phase plasma spraying

Sentencas: Three kinds of elements (Ni, Y, Zr) were observed in the MPS anode layer and the NiO content was calculated to be 49.6 wt%.
Titulo: Fabrication of finely structured silicon-supported SOFC with anode deposited by multi-phase plasma spraying

Sentencas: In the SPS process, the suspension flow rate was matched to the plasma gas flow rate to obtain proper injection condition.
Titulo: Fabrication of finely structured silicon-supported SOFC with anode deposited by multi-phase plasma spraying
